name: RetrieveFileTemplateMetadata
description:
Retrieve metadata for a specific file template.

Use this tool to get the metadata template instance applied to a file. It should be called when metadata information about a file is needed, such as tags, classifications, or other custom data types.

parameters.name: file_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for a file, obtainable from the file URL in the Box web application.

value_schema.description:
The unique identifier that represents a file.

The ID for any file can be determined
by visiting a file in the web application
and copying the ID from the URL. For example,
for the URL `https://*.app.box.com/files/123`
the `file_id` is `123`.

parameters.name: metadata_scope
parameters.description: Defines the scope of the metadata template to be retrieved. Options are 'global' or 'enterprise'.

value_schema.description: The scope of the metadata template.

parameters.name: metadata_template_name
parameters.description: The name of the metadata template to retrieve for the specified file.

value_schema.description: The name of the metadata template.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description:
The unique identifier that represents a file.

The ID for any file can be determined
by visiting a file in the web application
and copying the ID from the URL. For example,
for the URL `https://*.app.box.com/files/123`
the `file_id` is `123`.

value_schema.description:

The ID for any file can be determined
by visiting a file in the web application

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the metadata template.

value_schema.description: The scope of the metadata template.

parameters.name: template_key
parameters.description: The name of the metadata template.

value_schema.description: The name of the metadata template.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
